title: Durban University of Technology · Part-time
description: Tutored first-year students in Information and Communication Technology (ICT) at Durban University of Technology. Guided students through the Applications Development modules, APDA101 in the first semester and APDB101 in the second semester. Delivered lectures, facilitated practical coding sessions, and provided one-on-one support to enhance students' understanding of programming concepts and application development techniques. Assessed student progress, developed teaching materials, and fostered a collaborative learning environment.

title: Durban University of Technology · Part-time
description: DUT in Collaboration with Lenovo run this program annually to teach basic coding and robotics skills to high school Girls with the hopes of up having more females in STEM and skilling them for the incoming tech dominated future.
